- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
	Project: Next.js 14+ HelpDesk Frontend with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Axios, Context API

- [x] Scaffold the Project
	Next.js project created with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ESLint, App Router and src directory

- [x] Customize the Project
	Created complete authentication system with:
	- Axios service with JWT interceptor (/src/services/api.ts)
	- AuthContext for state management (/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx)
	- Login page (/src/app/login/page.tsx)
	- Cadastro page (/src/app/cadastro/page.tsx)
	- Dashboard page with route protection (/src/app/dashboard/page.tsx)
	- Type definitions (/src/types/auth.ts)
	- Environment variables (.env.local)

- [x] Install Required Extensions
	No additional extensions required

- [x] Compile the Project
	Successfully compiled with npm run build - all routes generated correctly

- [ ] Create and Run Task
	Project uses default Next.js scripts (dev, build, start)
